<S%G2532><s%> Also command <S%G3853><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be <S%G5600><s%> without reproach. <S%G423><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> provide <S%G4306><s%> for <S%G4306><s%> his own, <S%G2398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> his own household, <S%G3609><s%> he has denied <S%G720><s%> the faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> than an unbeliever. <S%G571><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> have <S%G1624><s%> turned aside <S%G1624><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

Let <S%G515><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> who rule <S%G4291><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> be counted worthy <S%G515><s%> of double <S%G1362><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> those who labor <S%G2872><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in teaching. <S%G1319><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "You shall <S%G5392><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> muzzle <S%G5392><s%> the ox <S%G1016><s%> when it treads out the grain. <S%G248><s%>" And, <S%G2532><s%> "The laborer <S%G2040><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> wages. <S%G3408><s%>"

Lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> hastily <S%G5030><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> no one, <S%G3367><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> be a participant in <S%G2841><s%> other men <S%G245><s%>'s sins. <S%G266><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> pure. <S%G53><s%>
